nodes.text: The Mandalorian Neo-Crusader Assault Armor was a type of Mandalorian armor made by the Mandalorian Neo-Crusaders. This silver set of armor was used by veterans on the front line during the Mandalorian Wars. This set of armor was all too recognizable and feared by Republic troops. Despite the Neo-Crusaders defeat at the hands of Revan, it was still in use around the time of the Dark Wars.

Neo-Crusader Assault armor was first featured in Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic but instead of the silver appearance like in Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords, it had a blue appearance of an average soldier. However, it is the only Mandalorian armor in Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic that has the appearance of the real armor and the only one with a helmet.
